function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential lack of privacy on balconies due to visibility and distance from neighboring balconies and buildings.","Impact":"Inadequate privacy may lead to discomfort, stress, and a reduced sense of personal space for residents.","Mitigation":"Increase privacy through the use of architectural elements, screening, and landscaping to create a sense of seclusion.","Technologies":"Privacy screens, planters, retractable awnings, and soundproofing materials.","People":"Residents, building owners, architects, urban planners.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building owners."},{"Description":"Presence of environmental noise and exposure to dust and smoke on balconies.","Impact":"Exposure to environmental noise and air pollutants can lead to health issues and reduced quality of life for residents.","Mitigation":"Implement soundproofing measures and air filtration systems, as well as creating green spaces to reduce pollution and noise.","Technologies":"Soundproof windows, air purifiers, green walls, and rooftop gardens.","People":"Residents, building owners, environmental health agencies.","Owner":"Building owners, environmental health agencies."}]}
